name: FLIP (itch) (danlvr, thnardg)
description:
Flip the world to help a little alien find his lost ship.

_______________________________________________________

FLIP is our very first game and we're very excited to be able to share it with you. Feel free to share your opinions and suggestions! 

Thank you for playing, we hope you enjoy it. And thank you to Kenney for the amazing work.

MADE BY @danlvr AND @thnardg FOR KENNEY JAM 2021
